timeline.bodyText: You probably need the colon after the TODO. It doesn't matter, but I assume there is some linter somewhere that will complain about that, because somehow that makes us more productive.
timeline.author: ejona86
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -101,6 +101,11 @@
             transport,
             initialWindowSize,
             method.getFullMethodName());
+
+    // TODO(ejona86) Fix a potential data race using MigratingThreadDeframer in OkHttp.

timeline.bodyText: It did actually see a benefit. So let's just say we're disabling it for the race.
timeline.author: ejona86
